title: Eye Bone
summaries: The Eye Bone is a pet-summoning item that summons a mobile Piggy Bank named Chester. Chester, being a pet, is essentially an upgrade to the Money Trough as it follows the player and does not require repeated summons. The Eye Bone has a 1/3 (33.33%) chance of being dropped by Deerclops.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a living chest to store your items
'It's looking into my soul.'
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
